summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the hardware fact gathering utilities used by Ansible across multiple operating systems (Linux, AIX, macOS, SunOS). The tests employ mocked system files and command outputs to check correct extraction of CPU, memory, MAC address, uptime, mount information, and device identification.
business_intent: Guarantee accurate and consistent hardware inventory data for configuration management and automation tools by validating the fact collection logic on each supported platform.
